title: I keep getting this message
body: In the new client, I keep getting this message that says an update needs to be retrieved and it will do so automattically.  Then when it is updating it sops at 5.1 and won't continue.

replies.body: This can be caused by a number of different things. I'd recommend first restarting your computer, then launching League as admin. Simply right click on the shortcut and choose *run as admin*. If it continues to do this after taking those steps, let me know.
Yep it helped.  I just right clicked on the regular shortcut and clicked run as administrator and everything worked fine from then on.  It even updated my shortcuts and everything.  Thanks!
